Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: naming_rule
Post._content:
## Rule for creating new file 

E.g: 

``` bash
$ hexo new "mypost" --category others
```
So the url for that post will be like this:
> mysite_url/:lang/:category/:year/:month/:day/:title/

> E.g: http://localhost:4000/vi/others/2018/08/11/mypost

And the directory that contains the file will be: 
> \_post/vi/other/mypost.md

If you don't provide the parameter for lang and category, it will be automatically set to undefined, so url for above post and directory of source file will be:
> E.g: http://localhost:4000/undefined/undefined/2018/08/11/mypost

> \_post/undefined/undefined/mypost.md

### List categories:

1. japansese
2. it
3. digital-marketing
4. life
5. others

_So, don't forget to give parameter for language and category :D_

__More info__: https://hexo.io/docs/permalinks
Post.raw:

title: naming_rule
tags: tips
---

## Rule for creating new file 

E.g: 

``` bash
$ hexo new "mypost" --category others
```
So the url for that post will be like this:
> mysite_url/:lang/:category/:year/:month/:day/:title/

> E.g: http://localhost:4000/vi/others/2018/08/11/mypost

And the directory that contains the file will be: 
> \_post/vi/other/mypost.md

If you don't provide the parameter for lang and category, it will be automatically set to undefined, so url for above post and directory of source file will be:
> E.g: http://localhost:4000/undefined/undefined/2018/08/11/mypost

> \_post/undefined/undefined/mypost.md

### List categories:

1. japansese
2. it
3. digital-marketing
4. life
5. others

_So, don't forget to give parameter for language and category :D_

__More info__: https://hexo.io/docs/permalinks

Post.title: Mt vi note khi s dng Cloud Dataflow
Post._content:
### 1. --region=REGION  ch nh Region cho Job Dataflow
Khi deploy 1 job ln dataflow, nu khng ch nh region, n s c **mc nh** deploy ln region us-central1, tc l Instance cha Job Dataflow ca bn s t  1 Data center nm  M. iu ny c th khng nh hng lm, cho n khi bn cn x l lng d liu nhiu hn, v trong x l c pht sinh cc I/O vi cc service khc. 

V d, sau khi tnh ton v x l d liu xong, th lu kt qu vo MySQL.Trong khi x l d liu th cng phi tham chiu 1 s thng tin t master trn MySQL. Instance ca Job dataflow nm  us-central1 (M), cn instance ca MySQL nm  asia-northeast1 (Tokyo). iu ny s nh hng kh ln n hiu nng ca x l ca bn, v vic truyn ti d liu gia Nht v M chc chn s khng th nhanh bng Nht - Nht ri . ng qun t cc instance  cng region cho cc x l c pht sinh I/O nh. 


### 2. S dng cu lnh Gcloud dataflow  cancel job.

Trc ht, g ci ny  ly ra list job trong Project.

 ```
 gcloud dataflow jobs list
 ```

Sau , bn c th dng cu lnh ny  cancel 1 job Dataflow.

```
gcloud dataflow jobs cancel JOB_ID --region REGION` 
```

Li 1 ln na c lin quan n Region. Nu khng ch nh parameter --region cho cu lnh bn trn, th Dataflow n s t ch nh region us-central1. Nu job ca chng ta ang nm  asia-northeast1, th cu lnh trn s khng c thc hin v s c li sau: 

> Failed to cancel job [XXXYYYZZZ]: (4a2b1f4c989a438d): Could not cancel workflow; user does not have sufficient permissions on project: AAABBBCCC,or the job does not exist in the project. Please ensure you have permission to access the job and the `--region` flag, us-central1, matches the job's region.

### 3. Hin ti, khng c cch no  **Delete** 1 job, m ch c th **Cancel** n i thi.

Mnh cng search google xem c cch no xo hn 1 job khi List Jobs trn UI ca Cloud Datafow khng. Nhng rt tic l khng c cch no c. 
Bn ch c th cancel 1 job no , v job  s vn tn ti trong list, vi Status l **Canceled**. Nhn ci list c nhiu Job deloy xong b li, phi cancel i, m khng xo c hn n khi list, tht l c ch ...

Nhn tin th cng c kh nhiu ngi c ch vi vic ny =))
[Here](https://googlecloudplatform.uservoice.com/forums/302628-cloud-dataflow/suggestions/10099404-a-way-to-delete-old-runs-of-dataflow-jobs-search). Ci issue ny tn ti 4 nm ri, v pha Dataflow c v khng c  nh cho thm tnh nng ny. 

### 4. V bn cht th Job Dataflow cng c deloy v chy trn nhng VM instance.
Th nn bn hon ton c th vo mc **Compute Engine**, v s thy 1, hoc nhiu con my VM  .  ct In use by s c tn ca Dataflow Job Name ABC,  l con my VM ny ang c dng bi Dataflow Job ABC.

Tuy n l 1 VM, nhng bn khng th hn gi bt tt n nh nhng VM thng thng khc ( tit kim chi ph nhng lc khng dng n chng hn), nu Dataflow Job type ca bn l Streaming. 
 m bo cho vic nhn v x l d liu mi lc mi ni, khng th stop instance cha Job Dataflow c. 
Instance trn GCE s b xo hon ton khi bn thc hin vic Cancel job. 

Ngoi ra, ging nh thuc tnh ca VM khc, khi deploy Job Dataflow, bn hon ton c th ch nh Network, Subnetwork cho n. 
Cho ai cn tham kho chi tit: [here](https://cloud.google.com/dataflow/docs/guides/specifying-networks)

Nu khng ch nh g, ging nh nhng VM khc, n s t ng chui vo Network **Default**.
C th dng 1 trong 2 cch di y  ch nh Subnetwork:
- Complete URL: 
```
https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/<HOST_PROJECT>/regions/<REGION>/subnetworks/<SUBNETWORK>
```
- Short form:
```
regions/<REGION>/subnetworks/<SUBNETWORK>
```

v thm parameter: `--subnetwork=SUB_NETWORK`
khi deploy job.

Tm thi th , bi vit hm nay xin php dng ti y. Hi vng chia s ny s c cht hu ch vi bn (nu bn l newbie v ang vc vch vi Dataflow)

Cn nu bn mun bit chi tit hn, th mi th u c  [here](https://cloud.google.com/dataflow/).

See you.
Post.raw:

Tuy n l 1 VM, nhng bn khng th hn gi bt tt n nh nhng VM thng thng khc ( tit kim chi ph nhng lc khng dng n chng hn), nu Dataflow Job type ca bn l Streaming.

Ngoi ra, ging nh thuc tnh ca VM khc, khi deploy Job Dataflow, bn hon ton c th ch nh Network, Subnetwork cho n.

Nu khng ch nh g, ging nh nhng VM khc, n s t ng chui vo Network **Default**.
C th dng 1 trong 2 cch di y  ch nh Subnetwork:
- Complete URL: 
```
https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/<HOST_PROJECT>/regions/<REGION>/subnetworks/<SUBNETWORK>
```

khi deploy job.
